title: Bavarian town clock tower
description: This intricate biscuit tower is made up of four flavoured shortbreads – vanilla, lemon and lavender, orange and cardamom and chocolate – built up in layers, decorated with buttercream and with an iced clock tower at the top.   Equipment and preparation: you will need a free-standing food mixer fitted with the whisk attachment and a small piping bag for this recipe.
ingredients: 960g/2lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for rolling
1 packet green flower paste (available from specialist baking stores)
